Indices and tables

Warning

Ready for daily use but still changing

PyCATHY is a Python wrapper for CATHY [1] (V1) easing the process for mesh creation, forward hydrological modeling, and output visualization of CATHY simulations.

Hint

The initial version (v0.0.1) includes a Data Assimilation extension to facilitate the integration of geophysical data into the hydrological model. You can check the list of improvements in the github releases.

Getting started

New to pyCATHY? Start here!

Overview

Need help?

Open an issue on Github.

https://github.com/BenjMy/pycathy_wrapper

A list of modules and functions.

Citations help support our work!
